text: Saying "there's no way you can deny that" is silly, different games from different genres are meant to appeal to different people. text: Mine is probably Final Fantasy VI as well, or Chrono Trigger. No, FFVI totally. Such beautifully crafted plot, characters and music. That game is so much more than just an ordinary RPG that you play through in a few hours and then forgets about. Even though the characters look like lego's, they might be very much "realer" than some people in the real world. The way you connect to the characters in FFVI is mesmerizing and haunting. Beautiful game. *thumbs up @ your comment.*
